message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe would be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $13,000.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product. Could we possibly meet in the middle?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. While I'm willing to negotiate, $10,000 is simply too low for me. How about we split the difference and I offer the product for $11,500? This gives you a good deal and allows me to recover some of my costs.
